GROWTH DRIVERS & DATA POINTS: Auto: 1.81M cars (+38% YoY), $1.8B regulatory credits, Cybertruck reveal. Energy: 15 GWh deployed, Megapack backlog begins. FSD: V11.4 rollout, 400M FSD miles. Other Svcs: 60K Superchargers, Insurance in 3 states.

Other Svcs: $3.5B Q3 revenue (+25% YoY from software + charging), 3.5K new stalls (network +18% YoY), Insurance in 12+ states, EU solar production starting Q1 2026. Q4 est. to full-year: total revenue $28.1B Q3 (+12% YoY), net income $1.4B (–37% YoY on opex + AI R&D).
